p: Only five percent of the library extracts were preferentially active against L. donovani. These were mostly lipophilic, e.g., the chloroform fraction of Ambrosia artemisiifolia L. (syn. Ambrosia maritima L.) (Asteraceae) leaves and the petroleum ether fractions of Piper cubeba L. f. (Piperaceae) fruits, Portulaca oleracea L. (Portulacaceae) aerial parts, and Typha angustifolia L. (Typhaceae) stem.
